entry.title: deepansumor/TagItJS: TagIt.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides real-time, configurable tag suggestion functionality for both contentEditable elements and input/textarea fields. It supports custom triggers, async data loading with debouncing, middleware, and dynamic suggestion management.
entry.content: TagIt.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides real-time, configurable tag suggestion functionality for both contentEditable elements and input/textarea fields. It supports custom triggers, async data loading with debouncing, middleware, and dynamic suggestion management.

entry.title: YounesElhjouji/toggle-js-extension: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly toggle JavaScript on or off for the current site. Use a simple keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Command+J) or click the browser action icon to switch between enabling and disabling JavaScript, with a visual badge indicator showing the current state.
entry.content: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly toggle JavaScript on or off for the current site. Use a simple keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Command+J) or click the browser action icon to switch between enabling and disabling JavaScript, with a visual badge indicator showing the current state.
